preference.name: WEB_core_help_server
preference.preference_description: This should be set to the URL of the site's core TC help page (used to create help::Tc link).

preference.name: WEB_help_server
preference.preference_description: This should be set to the URL of the site's Web help page, e.g., http://host:port/tc/help/thin_client_dhtml/book.html (used to create help::Tc Web link) or if you are using the same web server for help and Teamcenter Thin Client, you could just use a relative URL.
